ygData.subject: Re: Mermaids and other water mysteries
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They are definitely in the game.  When we were exploring the island, there was one on shore (actually floating in the air like the shark at Freeport
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 9 Jun 1999, Ward Family wrote:
>
> I too swear I saw a mermaid while swimming in South Qeynos waiting for the
> boat. It was certainly not a shark. Yet when I swam to where it was, there
> was nothing there (I was to dumb or dumbfounded to /con it). I have asked
> many if they had seen one, but people kept saying that there are none in the
> game.

They are definitely in the game. When we were exploring the
island, there was one on shore (actually "floating" in the air
like the shark at Freeport sometimes floats). Vaguely
Japanese looking with red hair. It made these bubbly
whistling noises.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
